long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
selfie-fy your web browsing experience! look at yourself looking at the internet.

To prevent the allow camera dialogues, you can run Chrome from Terminal with a command something like this (note: this is NOT recommended, for security reasons!):
"/Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --use-fake-ui-for-media-stream"
